topic.title: Why not a single black of the NFL or NBA or so called entertainment said a single word about pedogate
topic.body:

topic.title: How many industries has the GMO/DNA/RNA industry wounded with the covid release?
topic.body: Wouldn't it be time to maybe calculate that the costs aren't worth it? ahh, nothing will be too much for the transhumanist agenda. The goal being to treat life itself as a windows OS, you pay for the "patches" or you die... a clever way to corner life itself. I guess we resisted too much with frankenfood already to their tastes. Or it's an alien taken over :).

1615440077_1MjYP6RTszD3YQWphEM1tBu8a4d3T.body:
At least, I am sure she and her prince don't care at all about Assange or all the rapes victims in the UK ! They laughed, feasted and drank tea but of course they aren't RAYCISTS... they are just "nobles".

from https://www.gatestoneinstitute.org/3068/muslim-child-rape-gangs-britain

>The Liverpool Crown Court heard horrific testimony from five victims -- the youngest was 13 when the abuse began -- who were plied with alcohol, drugs and gifts so they could be "passed around" among a group of men aged between 24 and 59 for sex in apartments, houses, cars, taxis and kebab shops.
>... 

>According to experts interviewed by The Telegraph, while white pedophiles generally operate in isolation, the Muslim-led grooming is being done mostly by large numbers of men acting as a group. Several of the men on trial in Liverpool apparently told their victims that it was all right for them to be passed around for sex with dozens of men "because it's what we do in our country."
>... 

>Although five girls testified at the trial in Liverpool, British police are pursuing leads that the Rochdale gang exploited at least 50 other girls.
>... 

>The victims came from 13 towns and cities and in each case two or more men were convicted of offenses.
>...

So when you see those royals on tv, don't forget which side they have chosen.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rotherham_child_sexual_exploitation_scandal

>Cases highlighted by Norfolk included that of a 15-year-old having a broken bottle inserted into her; a 14-year-old being held in a flat and forced to have sex with five men; and a 13-year-old girl, "with disrupted clothing", found by police in a house at 3 am with a group of men who had given her vodka. A neighbour had called the police after hearing the girl scream. The girl was arrested for being drunk and disorderly, but the men were not questioned.[13][148]
